question: A friend of yours is thinking about applying for the same course that you did at university. He/she has asked for your advice about studying the subject.Write a letter to your friend. In your letter•	Give details of the course you took at the university•	Explain why you recommend the university•	Give some advice about how to apply
text: I’m so glad that you finally made your decision to study animal science at the university. Well, it is a four-year course which in the end, you will be able to work as a veterinarian without any supervisor. You will have both theoretical and practical classes for each of the subjects to be prepared in all aspects of this major.

I really appreciate that you chose to attend my university, as it has expert teachers in this field, well-equipped laboratories, and a well-stocked library. Also, it has a massive campus with good restaurants and cafes where you can rest between your classes.

Connell university has a very sophisticated website that you can use to fill your application. Before applying, pay special attention to the starting dates of your classes and the fees you need to pay for your insurance which is really important in our major. You can call me anytime if you had any further questions.
Please do keep in touch, and let me know how is everything going.
